definition: an evasion of the point of an argument by raising irrelevant distinctions or objections, argue over petty things
details:
noun
- an evasion of the point of an argument by raising irrelevant distinctions or objections
= synonyms: quiddity
verb
- argue over petty things
= example: argue over petty things
= synonyms: bicker, squabble, niggle, pettifog, brabble
- evade the truth of a point or question by raising irrelevant objections
